agency_desc: A national provider of wireless voice, messaging, and data services. Lifeline discounted service is available through subsidiary Safelink Wireless.
service_description: Offers a free cell phone and 350 minutes of free nationwide wireless voice service each month to Indiana households receiving public assistance or within set income guidelines. Minutes do not roll over from month to month. Additional minutes can be purchased. Limit one Lifeline service per household. Promotion available for 500 free minutes for the first four months.
site_details: Call or visit website for an application. -- Mail or fax completed application along with any required documentation. -- Customers must make at least one call per month and must reapply each year to continue service.
site_eligibility: Living in Indiana (or another state in the service area) -- Household income at or below 135% Federal Poverty Guidelines -OR-   receiving Medicaid, food stamps, SSI, TANF, Section 8, EAP, or free school lunch -- No one in household already receiving Lifeline discounted service (landline or wireless)

agency_desc: A nonpprofit organization that provides online educational resources, a free helpline for questions about Parkinson's, and provide referrals to health professionals and research.
service_description: A nonprofit organization that provides online educational resources, a free helpline for questions about Parkinson's, and provide referrals to health professionals and research.
site_details: Call or visit website for information.

agency_desc: A commerical agency that prepares and delivers frozen meals to older adults and people with disabilities who are unable to shop and/or prepare food for themselves or travel to a site where meals are being served.
service_description: Delivers frozen meals to homebound persons. Limited special diet meals like reduced concentrated sweets and low sodium diets are available. A minimum of 10 meals are delivered by Fed Ex or UPS for private pay clients.
site_details: Call to register. Be prepared to provide name, address, phone number, and credit card number to process for private pay callers.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 9am-6pm -- delivery date Mon-Sat; hours vary
site_eligibility: Open -- With physical, intellectual, emotional, behavioral, or social disabilities
